column4: How can you update wine to the latest version? I'm having problems with the one on ubuntu software center.
use the wine ppa repos  or repos from winehq
Ohh, i don't really understand that, I'm a beginner.
http://www.winehq.org/download/deb
thank you
or via command line --> sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntu-wine/ppa
thats how it works on myu netbook and  other laptops
its a feature of X and the video drivers.
'xinerama' lets you have one big wide display. or you could setup as 2 independant displays
depends on yoru video card/chipset to some degree
i just used the  system > settings > monitors tool to set mine up
but if i plug the 2nd monitor will the program....system > settings>monitors tool notice that?
try it and find out. on my laptop. I think i had to restart X the first time i pluged it in.
also the laptop may have special FN-XXX keys to enable the externaldisplay
And how do you restart x?
Yes, i have one too//f1...it's a dell inspiron 1545
I enabled the monitor but it shows me the same screen as in laptop.
but i want to be  a different screen so I can have more space to work with
Try the monitor settings tool now. see if you can enable xinerama
what video card/chipset is in that thing? ati/nvidia/intel?
ati, ati hd 4330:)
no idea what limits are with ati. there may be an ati specific config tool
I will try and see
